summary: Test suite for the LEditsPP image editing pipeline built on the Stable Diffusion XL model, covering both fast unit tests with mocked components and slower integration tests with the full model, validating core operations such as inversion, batch inversion, warm‑up handling, and end‑to‑end editing.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the LEditsPP editing pipeline before deployment, enabling reliable image manipulation features in products that rely on Stable Diffusion XL.
